name: SpinOFun
description:
Hey guys....i made a new game .....well........i don't  know  if i can call it a game ....remember fidget spinner ?  Its just way advanced version of it ! . Its Available for android as well as PC.And I would suggest to give it a try and comment what you think and.........

A BIG THANKS TO ED SHEERAN (BEST SINGER FOR ME)
